Texts.Chs: 肃清^orange;精英德拉尔侵略部队^reset;
与^orange;洛克汗^reset;交谈以传送到^orange;星球表面^reset;
Texts.Eng: Talk to ^orange;Rokhan^reset; to warp down to the ^orange;planet below^reset;

Texts.Chs: 前卫队在卡尔马尼与叛变无人机编队发生了冲突。我需要你传送到行星的表面，并^green;肃清^orange;叛变精英无人机编队^green;游荡的领域。作为回报，^green;你可以进入位于这座远行庇护所的^green;前卫队射击场^white;。
Texts.Eng: The Vanguard is having issues with violated Drahl units on Kharmani. I need you to warp down to the planet's surface and ^green;put an end to the ^orange;Violated Elite Drahl ^green;roaming the grounds^white;. In return, ^green;you will earn yourself access to the Vanguard's shooting range ^white;here in the Starfarer's Refuge.

Texts.Chs: 干得好，我听说叛变精英无人机编队被消灭了。请带上这张安全卡，它可以让你打开射击场的门。
Texts.Eng: Well done, I hear that the violated Elite Drahl has been eliminated. Please, take this security card; it will allow you to open the door to the shooting range.
